Class GuiGameOverUI

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.guiControl.GuiGameOverUI
public final class GuiGameOverUI extends Object
UI building helpers for the game-over overlay. Provides a title node, pulsing animation and a convenience method that assembles and shows a fully interactive game-over dialog wired to the provided controller.

  • Method Details

    • createGameOverTitle

      public static javafx.scene.text.Text createGameOverTitle()
      Create a styled title Text node for the game-over dialog.

    • startGameOverPulse

      public static javafx.animation.Animation startGameOverPulse(javafx.scene.text.Text title)
      Start a pulsing animation which emphasises the provided title node. Returns the running Animation so callers may stop it.

    • buildGameOverSubtitleBox

      public static javafx.scene.layout.VBox buildGameOverSubtitleBox(String scoreStr, int currentScore, String timePlayed, int prevHighBeforeGame)
      Build a subtitle box showing score/time and previous-high information. This helper returns a small VBox suitable for inclusion in the dialog.

    • showGameOver

      public static void showGameOver(GuiController controller)
      Build and show the game-over overlay for the given controller. Runs UI work on the JavaFX thread and wires buttons to call back into the controller for restart / exit behaviour.
